pkgmetadata.longdescription: Diversity-Dependent Diversification // Implements maximum likelihood methods based on the diversity-dependent birth-death process to test whether speciation or extinction are diversity- dependent. See Etienne et al. 2012, Proc. Roy. Soc. B 279: 1300-1309, doi: 10.1098/rspb.2011.1439. Also implements maximum likelihood methods to detect various types of key innovations in the light of diversity-dependence. See Etienne Haegeman 2012, Am. Nat. 180: E75-E89, doi: 10.1086/667574. Finally, DDD contains a function to simulate the diversity-dependent process.
